ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"
ygData.msgSnippet: When people do this - I say Please don t tell me how to play my class - since I m not telling you how to play yours - of course if people try to imply you re
ygData.messageBody:
When people do this - I say "Please don't tell me how to play my class -
since I'm not telling you how to play yours" - of course if people try to
imply you're not a good bard - you may even offer to leave the group so they
can find a better when (which essentially you did and just avoided a
confrontation)

On a separate note - I was in the Hole - and highest level in the group
(first time in ages) - so I was elected to pull - I know bards make good
pullers - but I usually don't. Anyway - we're in the pit and I go to pull
and am all the way to the door to the castle thing - when I go link dead.

Now - I've had zero PL and decent ping times all night. I have DSL and the
majority of the time my connection is flawless - so why of all times - does
the system have to drop me at literally the worst possible moment...

Needless to say - when I finally was able to get back on - I was dead.
Can't complain too much because one of the people in my group had another
character that was a cleric with the epic - but still - just my luck!

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2001 11:36 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] "Shouldn't you be playing Manasong!"

Well, it finally happened to me. I haven't played in a lot of pickup
groups, but have done a bit. And until now, I've not heard this phrase
uttered. I thought I had escaped it. But noooooooooo... the pickup group I
got last night was the WORST I've had in EQ that I can remember.

Players: Bardette, Monk, Ranger, Paladin, Shaman, Wizard (all between 43 and
45)
Scene: Solb

The wizard "Shouldn't you be playing manasong?"... me... "uh, I am"...
her..."well just play it all the time".... me ... "nope"... her... "well you
aren't a very good bard are you?"... me... "nope"

The paladin "Tani, you need to play regen now"... me ... "well this song
does both so just sit tight"... her..."well i want to regen first then get
mana" ... me.. "that's nice"...

Ok so I was a little sarcastic, but I wont even get into the pulling
techniques used by the ranger... Needless to say, I took the advice of
someone here and with a "OMG I think my roommate just dropped something bad
.. heard a crash have to go check it out".. I logged... but wowowowow...
what an experience.

Hope you all had a nice weekend and a little laugh from my story :)
